solution_line_template: After two years, Gary has {initial_chickens} * {multiplier_after_two_years} = <<{initial_chickens}*{multiplier_after_two_years}={chickens_after_two_years}>>{chickens_after_two_years} chickens
Gary collects each day {chickens_after_two_years} chickens * {eggs_per_chicken_per_day} eggs per chicken = <<{chickens_after_two_years}*{eggs_per_chicken_per_day}={eggs_per_day}>>{eggs_per_day} eggs
In a week he collects {eggs_per_day} eggs per day * {days_per_week} days per week = <<{eggs_per_day}*{days_per_week}={eggs_per_week}>>{eggs_per_week} eggs
